description:
Balatro is a poker-themed roguelike deck-building video game developed by LocalThunk.
In the game, players play poker hands to score points and defeat "blinds", while improving their deck and purchasing joker cards with a variety of effects. 
Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balatro_(video_game)

v0.0.2.description:
Fixed some of the biggest bugs from v0.0.1.
Might actually be playable for longer than 30 seconds now.
v0.0.2.title: v0.0.2

v0.0.3.description:
Added Tarot, Planet and Spectral Cards as AP Items.
Added Booster Packs as AP Items.
This version is not compatible with seeds or saves from v0.0.2

Thanks to @Mysthaps Jimbo will say the cause of the deathlink now (Myst also fixed a bunch of broken death link logic, thanks for that as well). 

Also thanks to @Aurelius7309 for looking over the code and cleaning it up a bit.
v0.0.3.title: v0.0.3

v0.0.4.description:
Big new Addition: AP Items in shop. No special sprite for them yet, probably also a bit buggy functionality still. 

You can set how many shop items you want in the total playthrough.
You can set minimum and maximum price for shop items.

You can also force hand selected Jokers to be filler now!
v0.0.4.title: v0.0.4

v0.0.5.description:
General cleanup, fixed some UI issues:
- Removed pop-up when receiving an item, as I found this to be quite annoying. The little notification on the side remains.
- Removed the default unlock conditions of decks, they might confuse people
- Checks in ante 8 should now actually register
- Added sprite for AP shop items (not my own sprite, but from Egg on the Balatro discord, huge thanks to them!)
- Unlocked decks don't require a restart anymore when received

Also the apworld requires you to have Archipelago version 0.5.0 now, which is the main branch of Archipelago. im sorry.

Known issues:
- When pixel smoothing is on then AP Shop sprite is fucked up
- Sometimes the game crashes when loading to main menu screen
v0.0.5.title: v0.0.5

v0.0.6.description:
Fixed some bugs, cleaned up connection UI a bit. 
Made mod compatible with newest Steamodded alpha (it probably won't work with an old version, so i recommend getting the [newest alpha of Steamodded(Alpha)](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-alpha)). 
Here are the changes:

- Replaced the Sprite in the shop with an even cooler sprite (again, thank you to Egg for the awesome pixel art)
- Fixed Sprite being fucked when pixel smoothing is on
- Fixed crash when going to main menu after having unlocked a new item
- Fixed bug where client kept trying to connect after profile selector is closed
- After three failed connection attempts client will stop trying to connect automatically

Known issues:
- Unlock item popup says "error" when unlocking anything but a deck, voucher or joker.
v0.0.6.title: v0.0.6

v0.1.0.description:
Known issues: 
- The current apworld generates potentially unbeatable seeds, fix is being worked on.

Additions:
- An alert will pop up when a new location is checked
- Added a bunch of new filler items
- Added a few new traps

Changes:
- "overpowered" permanent filler items such as bonus joker slot or bonus hand will now be available in limited quantities

Fixes:
- Unlock item popup no longer says "Error" for planet, tarot or spectral cards

The reason this release is not v0.0.7 but v0.1.0 is because we finally have a version of the mod that i view as "presentable". Throughout the last month I worked on this pretty much every single day and I am happy to say that this hard work paid off. I had to learn lua and python in the span of a week to make any meaningful progress at the start. To be fair, there will probably still be a few new bugs in this version, so v0.1.1 won't be that far away, but overall I think this is a good base to build upon. I'm thankful to the playtesters of the mod, who had to tolerate a lot of bullshit that happened because of bugs. I'm also thankful to the people who have already contributed to this mod, I greatly appreciate it.

Have fun playing.
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
Previous version had some problem with generation, hopefully fixed now

Additions:
* Goal will now be displayed in the main menu
* Added option to set how many permanent filler items will be created

Changes:
* Shop Items are now tied to stake, you can have a maximum amount of 150 per stake

Fixes:
* APWorld logic now works (fingers crossed)
* Consumables now properly spawn in packs
* Showman is now being considered by randomizer
* Increased text length for input fields in connection menu
* Fixed unlock Joker goal to actually track Joker amount now
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
Known issues:
Various crashes have already been reported 

Additions:
* Added new "Short Mode" where jokers, tarots, planets and spectrals are in bundles, resulting in less items overall. These bundles don't show up if short mode is not toggled on in the yaml.
* Added joker bundles (1 bundle contains 10 jokers)
* Added tarot bundle (contains all tarots)
* Added planet bundle (contains all planets)
* Added spectral bundle (contains all spectrals)
* Added progressive vouchers

Fixes: 
* Fixed typos when selecting filler jokers
* Fixed some checks from being incorrectly received
* Fixed unlock joker goal (again), it *should* now properly detect if the goal is reached

Changes: 
* Added a bit of artificial balancing so items are distributed into more spheres
v0.1.2.title: v0.1.2

v0.1.3.description:
Additions:
- Added option to unlock all stakes from the start
- Added a bunch of new filler items
- Added option to choose specifically which stakes will have checks
- Added a cool new sprite for the location check popup. Thanks for the insanely impressive pixel art by @Spad_Overolls (on discord). Stuff like this makes me keep going!
- Also the other sprites for Tarots, Planets, Spectrals and Booster Packs now properly show up!
All the sprite work (code and art) has been done by the wonderful @SpaD-Overolls, thank you so much!

Changes/Fixes:
- Fixed various crashes
- Connection Text and Goal will now only be displayed in the main menu
v0.1.3.title: v0.1.3

v0.1.4.description:
Additions/Changes:
- Jokers are no longer locked but debuffed from the start to balance things out - this means you can get every Joker from the start, but the corresponding AP Item has to be found for them to be active. All other unlocks stay the same.
- Buffoon packs will prioritize Jokers that are already unlocked. 
- Added text to shop item so the player knows which item will be unlocked. 
- Added text to unlock notification so the player knows what they unlocked. 

Fixes:
- Sometimes unlock Icons wouldn't show up fixed by @SpaD-Overolls 
- Some AP only behaviour would happen when not playing with AP

Also some general code cleanup thanks to @SpaD-Overolls
v0.1.4.title: v0.1.4

v0.1.5.description:
# The Stake Update
**This version is not compatible with older apworlds.**

This one is a big update, so you might encounter some bugs (but you're used to that with this mod).
I couldn't have done this without @SpaD-Overolls, who basically took over all of the client side implementation for the stakes, huge thanks to them! 

Additions:
- You can now unlock stakes as items: Either for all decks or per deck individually, thanks to @SpaD-Overolls 
- The game now only shows included Stakes, thanks to @SpaD-Overolls 
- The game now only shows included Decks
- New goals: Beat x decks on x stake; Win with x Jokers on x Stake
- New Trap Notifications thanks to @SpaD-Overolls 

Fixes:
- Fixed Shop Items not spawning
- Fixed Shop Items sometimes not showing which items they are going to unlock
- Fixed legendary joker notification not being rendered properly. Fixed by @SpaD-Overolls 
- Fixed various crashes



Upcoming features:
- Decide whether locked items will be removed or debuffed
- Option for consumables to be debuffed instead of removed
- Profile selector not loading profile if it notices that server and client seed do not match
v0.1.5.title: v0.1.5

v0.1.6.description:
Small follow-up to the last version, basically just the upcoming features promised in last release.
This version is not compatible with older AP Worlds.

Additions:
- You can now choose wether or not you want locked jokers to be debuffed or removed from the game
- You can now choose wether or not you want locked consumables (= Tarots, Planets, Spectrals) to be debuffed or removed from the game
- The game now checks if the seed on the client side and serverside match, so you cannot accidentally load a profile for a different AP world

Fixes:
- Fixed the apworld creating unnecessary items when in "Stakes per deck" mode
- Fixed a crash when not playing in the Archipelago mode
- Fixed the red deck being broken
v0.1.6.title: v0.1.6

v0.1.7.description:
Hey! Release time! I'm gonna be honest, this release was 90% developed by the dear @SpaD-Overolls, their work here was incredible. I pretty much only worked on the serverside and that was mainly bugfixes (of which there are still many to come, im sure). 

The main reason for this release other than to just get the current stuff tested out is that there may be a new balatro update in the next coming days, so getting this out is not a bad idea for now, so we have time to update our mod (hopefully not much necessary here).

Update: so it turns out the content update will be in 2025, so still a few months to go luckily!

Additions:
* new goal "beat unique decks" where each win for a deck on a different stake counts towards the goal separately. Thank you to @SpaD-Overolls for implementing the clientside.
* pretty much every AP Bonus item or trap you receive now has its own custom icon, drawn and implemented by @SpaD-Overolls 
* Archipelago shop items are now shuffled (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Added a lot of description text for items (thank you to @SpaD-Overolls)
* Added russian localization (by @SpaD-Overolls)
* Added german localization
* Challenges are no longer playable in the Archipelago profile (added a "coming soon" label) (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Items from other mods don't appear anymore if you're connected to Archipelago 
* The UI of the mod "Galdur" is now also compatible with this mod

Fixes:
* Fixed some debuffed Jokers to work even though they shouldn't (thank you @SpaD-Overolls)
* The apworld generation has greatly improved its world generation and has better balancing now
* Seed Money and Money Tree now interact with bonus interest correctly  
* Fixed the legendary joker and the sould notifications (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Fixed a crash when deathlink is enabled

Behind the scenes:
* Code is now split into multiple files to not lose your mind when trying to find a function
* Localization is now properly implemented in this mod which makes it easier to change the UI text
* apworld code has also undergone great refactoring and is now actually presentable and i don't lose my mind (as much)  there anymore
* There is now a short video tutorial explaining how to install lovely, steamodded and this mod! surely i wont have to remake it once the balatro update is out

Upcoming features:
* Challenges 
* new UI to display goals

Known Issues:
* When disconnecting from the server the game crashes. Your progress is still saved in this case, but it's inconvenient.
v0.1.7.title: v0.1.7

v0.1.8.description:
This is just a hotfix for the latest Steamodded update, they added their own stake implementation, so @SpaD-Overolls removed some (now) redundant code from the mod. 

So **make sure to update to the newest steamodded main branch**, otherwise this mod will not work.

Fixes:
* Fixed a crash when disconnecting from an apworld and then connecting to a new apworld
* Fixed some crashes when dying with deathlink enabled

Cool stuff:
* Improved speed of apworld generation a bit
* Thank you to @pamymaf for adding a linux guide, greatly appreciated!

Upcoming features are still the same as last release.

Have fun gaming!
v0.1.8.title: v0.1.8

v0.1.9.description:
***Don't forget to update your [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/) and your [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-alpha) installation before installing this version!***

Sadly there's a bug that causes a crash when hovering over shop items, this is related to the new hint system. This is why I recommend downloading the latest branch [here](https://github.com/SpaD-Overolls/BalatroAP) instead of the balatroAP.zip in this release

As with the latest few releases, a huge thank you goes out to @SpaD-Overolls, they took over all of the client side development again. 

Additions:
* Consumable AP Items: new Planet/Tarot/Spectral Card that unlocks an item when redeemed (@SpaD-Overolls)
* New main menu UI to display goals/connection status (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Config menu: You can set certain settings like death link or choose if jokers should be debuffed or removed. Default behaviour is to follow the yaml settings. You can also customize the main menu UI a bit. (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Locked AP Items now display their name in the collection (previously just "Locked AP Item" -> now "Locked AP Item (Red Deck)") (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Hints are now shown on Locked Items if available (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Looking at Shop AP Items will now permanently add them as hints (@SpaD-Overolls)
* Full french translation added (@deoxis9001)
* Mod now checks for minimum Steamodded version (@SpaD-Overolls)
* You can now enable jokers from other mods when connecting to Archipelago (@SpaD-Overolls)
* You can now set the size of Joker bundles (2-30 jokers per bundle)
* You can now make custom consumable bundles (up to 5 bundles, more info in the yaml. This feature is considered "beta". It may break.)

Fixes:
* Fixed stake progress resetting on reload
* Permanent bonus hands/discards now properly update if player is on a run while received
* Some AP world generation issues
* Improved yaml settings descriptions

Upcoming features:
* Challenges
* Saving progress serverside
* Better handling if server disconnects during runs
* Multiple AP saves at once
v0.1.9.title: v0.1.9a

v0.1.9b.description:
***Don't forget to update your [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/), your [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-alpha) and your [ap-luaclientpp](https://github.com/black-sliver/lua-apclientpp/releases) installation before installing this version!***

^take this seriously btw, you need to update your shit.

This release is mainly a lot of bugfixes to the previous v0.1.9a release. 

Clientside fixes (all done by @SpaD-Overolls):
- Fixed a crash related to item names on AP checks
- Fixed a crash with The Fool when copying an AP consumable
- Main Menu will now show locked cards with hints
- Magic Deck's Fools and Ghost Deck's Hex will now spawn undebuffed even if you don't have those cards unlocked.

Serverside (world generation) fixes:
- Shop checks should now properly require their respective stake to be unlocked
- Consumable checks should now properly require their respective logic to be unlocked

Upcoming features are the same as before.

Known Issues:
- Stakes are sometimes displayed incorrectly 
- Progress is sometimes lost/reset. If you encounter this please tell us, we are not able to reproduce it reliable as of right now so your help is greatly appreciated
- Various other issues (check the AP after dark discord, maybe somebody already reported it, if not please report it yourself)
v0.1.9b.title: v0.1.9b

v0.1.9c.description:
***Don't forget to update your [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/), your [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-alpha) and your [lua-apclient](https://github.com/black-sliver/lua-apclientpp/releases) installation before installing this version!***

Huge thanks to @SpaD-Overolls for working on this patch. 
This release covers the newer Steamodded version (namely better calc). 
It also improves the behaviour regarding joining new worlds with different seeds, by storing the progress on the archipelago server.

Additions:
- Serverside saves

Fixes:
- stake logic is fixed
- fixed progress being deleted sometimes
- fixed non-logic hint crash
- fixed mod not working with new steamodded version
- fixed bug that caused game to crash when playing on a non-AP save
- fixed debuffed negative jokers not providing an extra slot but taking one away when sold


Serverside changes: 
- Put items into item groups like jokers, vouchers, etc. (this is apparently useful for hinting)

Upcoming features are the same as before.
v0.1.9c.title: v0.1.9c

v0.1.9d.description:
***Don't forget to update your [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/), your [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-the-alpha) and your [lua-apclient](https://github.com/black-sliver/lua-apclientpp/releases) installation before installing this version!***

Once again thanks to @SpaD-Overolls for making this update.

Fixes: 
- Fixed crash when losing a run
- Fixed deck unlocks
- Fixed issues with disconnecting
- Fixed issues with joker stickers
- Improved serverside saving, added serverside run save
- Fixed item groups 

Upcoming features are the same as before.
v0.1.9d.title: v0.1.9d

v0.1.9er2.description:
***Don't forget to update your [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/), your [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/releases/) and your [lua-apclient](https://github.com/black-sliver/lua-apclientpp/releases) installation before installing this version!*** 

Alright, small update to just fix issues with the current version, there's big things coming very soon though!

Thank you to @SpaD-Overolls for making this update again!

Additions:
* Added borrowed sticker
* Shop will now show unlocked items more often than locked ones
* Non-Shop sources (packs etc) will now be forced to show as many unlocked items as possible
* AP consumables and vouchers that unlock balatro items now show their item description as a tooltip on the side

Fixes:
* Fixed incorrect profile data sometimes carrying over while connecting
* Fixed incorrect goal display if goal is "unlock jokers" (Thanks @BurndiL)
* Fixed incorrect goal display if goal is "unlock decks" (Thanks @RFOyashiro)
* Fixed being unable to skip booster packs in some cases
* Fixed various crashes

Cool thing:
* The apworld is now compatible with Universal Tracker! (If there are still any issues please tell me)

Upcoming Features are the same as before (and more!)....
v0.1.9er2.title: v0.1.9e

v0.1.9f.description:
***Don't forget to update your [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/) and your [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/releases/) installation before installing this version!*** 

[Installation Instructions ](https://github.com/BurndiL/BalatroAP?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)

Fix time. I'm sorry it took this long but here we are! 

Some crash fixes by @9382 and people on the discord. Thank you guys a lot, and again, sorry for taking this long. 
There are some other crashes that might still happen, we will look into those soon™.

Also we now bundle the `lua-aplientpp.dll` with the modfiles, so installation is a bit easier now. Thanks to @SpaD-Overolls 
(This also includes the mac binary, so that installation could work as well now)
v0.1.9f.title: v0.1.9f
